d: "When struggling art student Selina Kyle (blame her comic book-loving parents for the name) finds herself unable to keep up with the costs of college, she decides to explore less "mainstream" ways to earn an income - namely, webcamming. Amidst the highly-competitive camgirl scene however, Selina must also find ways to stand out from the crowd of scantily-clad sex kittens and set herself apart by doing things none of the others have dared to. But, after all, college is a time to broaden one's horizons, explore new experiences, and discover new things about yourself. As she dives deeper into the world of webcamming, Selina begins to discover some things about herself that might have been better left buried..."
